TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeploymentException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: Defines a base class for all deployment-related exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DeploymentException is the base class of all deployment-related exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> class.
